text: Unexpected Uncle is a 1941 American comedy-drama movie directed by Peter Godfrey and starring Anne Shirley, James Craig, Charles Coburn, Ernest Truex, Renee Godfrey, Russell Gleason. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 comedy movies Category:1941 drama movies Category:1940s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Godfrey Category:Movies set in Florida
title: Unexpected Uncle
